input.sentences: friends assembling on an out door trip .
the architecture was stunning in the city center .
we enjoyed a rest at a book store .
we then went back to the beach to take in the view .
there was many interesting natural items to observe .
output.sentences: The next door friends took a trip together.
In their travels they found this stunning city center.
Around the corner they found a great store they enjoyed.
Along their trip they went to the beach and viewed the ocean.
On the beach they observed all the natural items that washed ashore.
